description: A collection of data merge fields.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the DataMergeField.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeField with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeFields within the specified range.

parameters.description: The DataMergeField, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: DataMergeField, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The DataMergeField, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: DataMergeField, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first DataMergeField in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last DataMergeField in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle DataMergeField in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeField with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the DataMergeField that follows the desired DataMergeField.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeField whose index follows the specified DataMergeField in the collection.

parameters.description: The DataMergeField whose index comes before the desired DataMergeField.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any DataMergeField in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every DataMergeField in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DataMergeField.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the DataMergeField with the specified index.

name: DataMergeFields
